disp-quote.p: “ Two years ago, during the flood, a daughter of my brother-in-law died with delivery complication in boat on the way from Khaliajhuri. At first, she was carried to the village doctor’s chamber which was too far away from her home but it was very difficult to find the said doctor at night. Then he suggested for going to Upazila hospital for severe complications. Eventually, she died on the way to hospital”.
